forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Cloudy then Rain And Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers between midnight and 2am, then rain and snow showers. Cloudy. Low around 36, with temperatures rising to around 38 overnight. South southwest wind around 12 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and snow showers before 8am, then rain and snow showers likely between 8am and 11am, then rain and snow showers likely between 11am and 5pm, then rain and snow showers likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 42. Southwest wind 10 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.
